titles: A letter to a gentleman of the Insurance Office, concerning the Cities insuring houses
author: I. W.
notes: Part of a controversy between the City of London and the Insurance Office for Houses; related documents are dated 1681.
Cropped at foot, with loss of print; imprint taken from Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Insurance Office for Houses (London, England) --  Early works to 1800.
Homeowner's insurance --  England --  Early works to 1800.
